misux.io.http.cover
Class Cover

java.lang.Object
  misux.io.http.cover.Cover

public class Cover
extends java.lang.Object

This class implements different fields and methods. Fields are the name of the cover, the image of the cover, the file extension (i.e. jpg, png) and the hyperlink to the image.

Author:
DSIW

Cover(java.lang.String interpret, java.lang.String album)
          Creates a new cover with no image, the extension "JPG" and no link.

Returns:

isWriteble

public boolean isWriteble()
Checks the image to write it. It checks, that a non-empty link and non-empty extension is set. The width and height must be greater than 0.

Returns:
true, if it's writeable

resize

public void resize(int width)
Scales the image to a same height and width.

Parameters:
width - Width and height of the new image.
